data.actual_result: You see an empty second line of markdown, and an extra empty markdown on the first line
data.expected_result: You see a single line of empty markdown
data.short_description: Making a double like single tick empty markdown creates two lines
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a single tick for markdown - Tap return and type another single tick - Send the empty markdown message - Observe the empty markdown - Type any word and send that - Notice the empty second line in the empty markdown and the markdown in the first line
